sources.title: ThePhantomVideoQualityUpgrade
sources.description: This print is a bit sharper and with a cleaner audio tack. EDIT 12/20/2018: A second version with enhanced contrast has just been added -- THE PHANTOM video quality upgrade 2 (MPEG4 559MB) A mystery that opens with a jail break and ends in a lunatic asylum, with lots of old dark house goings on in between. If you don't take this one seriously you're likely to have some fun. Directed by Alan James (as Alvin J Neitz). Released in 1931. complete print
